body.name: Amazon Essentials Women's Short-Sleeve Woven Blouse
features: RELAXED FIT: Relaxed, comfortable fit through the body.

DRAPEY FLUID TWILL: Made of 100% viscose, our non stretch viscose is extremely breathable and lightweight. With a beautiful drape and a soft, smooth finish, this fabric is comfortable and easy to wear all year round.
EVERYDAY BLOUSE: This versatile blouse is a classic wardrobe essential, perfect for work, on the go, or weekend exploring.
DETAILS: Features a simple band collar with v-neck, short sleeves, button front closure, and front shirring detail for a feminine look.

ADDITIONAL FABRIC & CARE INFORMATION: Due to the delicate nature of viscose fabric, we recommend you wash it in cold water and hang dry to prevent fabric shrinkage and wrinkles caused by any extra heat. Gently iron or steam for an even crisper, polished look.
body.description: We listen to customer feedback and fine-tune every detail to ensure our clothes are more comfortable, higher quality, and longer lasting—at affordable prices for the whole family. Amazon Essentials is focused on creating affordable, high-quality, and long-lasting everyday clothing you can rely on. Our line of women's apparel includes cashmere sweaters, fleece and down jackets, and more, including plus-size options. Our consistent sizing takes the guesswork out of shopping, and each piece is put to the test to maintain the highest standards in quality and comfort.

productInformation.name: Best Sellers Rank
productInformation.value: #946 in Our Brands (See Top 100 in Our Brands) #49 in Blouses & Button-Down Shirts

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Bought this to sew inside pockets for my daughter to wear after mastectomy. Perfect cut and easy to wear. Soft, cute fabric and love that it buttons up front.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Lovely and better than expected!
reviews.reviewText: What a pleasant surprise! The fabric is soft and lightweight without being see-through. It’s jersey knit, much nicer than T-shirt fabric.The cut is slightly boxy but the fabric drapes so nicely that it isn’t at all unflattering. I tried a partial tuck in front and it seemed to work without looking bunched up. The hem is slightly longer in back. The garment seems well constructedI am 5’5” and 130ish pounds, 36C on top with slightly narrow shoulders. I have tummy bulges to hide, and this top did the trick. And for anyone with wider shoulders, this blouse will likely fit you very nicely.On me, the Medium seemed a little big in the shoulders at first. The first wash seemed to approve the fit. I washed on gentle cycle in barely warm water (I tested the temp by hand), tumbled out the wrinkles with NO HEAT, and then laid flat to dry. I got only a tiny amount of shrinkage, and it was to my benefit. (I had also tried on size Small and decided the fit might be slightly tight in the armholes after washing.)I know there are reviewers who claimed they got severe shrinkage in the wash. But I think they must have been using water that's too warm, possibly too much agitation (I used gentle cycle), or they put the blouse in the dryer. Even low heat is too much for rayon fabric.I would say the top looks dressy-ish because of how well the fabric drapes. But it’s still casual enough and I think it will be cool and comfy this summer. I'll probably get another color.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cool and comfy
reviews.reviewText: I love this blouse! It's a great casual alternative to a t shirt. I've worn and washed it about a dozen times since purchasing and it still looks great. I usually don't like shirts that hang lower in the back than the front, but this one isn't too long and I like the look. It looks good tucked in, but I usually wear it untucked. Because the short sleeve is on the longer side, it was perfect for spring weather and I plan to wear it into the fall season. Right now, during these hot summer days, I'm enjoying its flowy and cool feel. I hang all my shirts and blouses up directly from the wash, but it looks like it would do well in the dryer and be wrinkle free.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Too low cut for me
reviews.reviewText: The material is soft and the print is nice. Could be worn for many occasions.The cut is a bit dumpy looking on me. I prefer a little more tucking in the waist.Mostly, the v-cut is just too low for my modest taste. BUT, I have a friend who has fpurchased at least two of these, and they fit fine on her. Like all clothing, it just depends on your shape and taste.The fabric is not see-through.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good quality and Comfortable
reviews.reviewText: I like the fit and it covers my belly. I bought two and plan to buy one of each color. More flattering than a t-shirt

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Cute and easy to wear
reviews.reviewText: The blouse is nice, I will enjoy it. The fit is a bit large on me though, I’m 5’3 and 135 lbs. It could use darts in the back to give it more shape. I will wash it first to see if it shrinks at all.Amazon- Nice blouse, consider adding a bit of black to the navy & white print, a thin line to outline the petals would be nice. The blouse could then easily be worn with black and well as navy. I would like to see more colors and prints in this style too.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Flattering, easy outfit
reviews.reviewText: Love this for the price point. I like madewell tops and this is the same idea. Flattering on me, soft, and easy to throw on when I don’t know what to wear. Also have it in black.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 8, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Bought for my wife while she is in rehab after a shoulder surgery. It was fairly easy to put on. Workmanship is satisfactory

Seguí la recomendación de Amazon sobre la talla y me quedo perfecta. El corte es recto pero los botones al frente hace qué tenga buena caída, se ve linda, el color de tela y estampado es igual al de la foto. Sin defectos de costira. Seguiré recomendación de lavado y secado por ser tela sintética.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I really like this blouse. Wasn't really expecting it to be up to much to be honest but took a chance as I find it so difficult to find classic summer tops that fit well. The blue and white print is lovely, fresh and cool looking and the fabric is nice quality. I found it true to size and a good fit and think I'll wear it a lot in summer.

Sehr angenehmes Tragegefühl. Intensive Farben wie auf dem Bild. Leicht zu bügeln, da sie leider sehr verknittert ankam, war aber auch der einzige Negativ Punkt, musste ich sie erstmal bügeln und passt perfekt Gr. 36 .
